item.title: 穆迪下调前景使北京针对市场空头的“战争”变得更加复杂
item.description:
Summary:
  • Moody's move raises pressure on govt to do more to support markets
  • Confidence in Chinese assets could deteriorate further, analysts
  • Beijing's steps to bolster economy, markets have had modest effect so far
翻译:概括：
  • 穆迪的举动给政府带来了采取更多措施支持市场的压力
  • 分析师对中国资产的信心可能进一步恶化
  • 北京采取的提振经济和市场的措施迄今为止效果有限

Moody's negative outlook on China has intensified Beijing's battle with market bears, raising pressure on the government for more forceful measures to prop up sinking stocks and stabilise the yuan as investor confidence deteriorates.翻译:穆迪对中国的负面展望加剧了北京方面与市场空头的斗争，在投资者信心恶化之际，加大了政府采取更有力措施支撑下跌股市并稳定人民币汇率的压力。

In its Tuesday announcement, the ratings agency flagged weakening growth prospects, adding to mounting global concerns that China's economic miracle is over, potentially leaving the world's second-largest economy stuck in a middle-income trap.翻译:该评级机构在周二的声明中指出，增长前景疲软，加剧了全球对中国经济奇迹已经结束的担忧，可能会让这个世界第二大经济体陷入中等收入陷阱。

While keeping China's sovereign rating at A1, Moody's cut its outlook to negative from stable, citing surging municipal debt and property market woes. Such concerns have prompted other institutions to draw comparisons with Japan's similar macroeconomic symptoms before its "lost decades" of stagnation.翻译:在维持中国主权评级为 A1 的同时，穆迪将其前景从稳定下调至负面，理由是市政债务激增和房地产市场困境。这种担忧促使其他机构将日本在“失去的几十年”停滞之前的类似宏观经济症状进行比较。

Even though China's rising debt levels and over-reliance on property have long been part of the conversation, the voice of a ratings agency carried enough weight to renew a sell-off in Chinese assets and prompt state bank actions in markets.翻译:尽管中国不断上升的债务水平和对房地产的过度依赖长期以来一直是人们讨论的一部分，但评级机构的声音足以再次抛售中国资产，并促使国有银行在市场上采取行动。

"This is a financial war," said Yuan Yuwei, founder and CIO of Water Wisdom Asset Management.翻译:“这是一场金融战。”水智慧资管创始人兼CIO袁宇伟表示。

Moody's move "would trigger foreign reduction in Chinese assets, and would also push up China's funding costs, potentially leading to deterioration in asset quality."翻译:穆迪此举“将引发外资减持中国资产，也会推高中国融资成本，可能导致资产质量恶化”。

Authorities have taken a raft of economic support measures and targeted steps to prop up the stock market, including cutting stamp duty, slowing the pace of listings and getting state-backed funds to buy stocks.翻译:当局采取了一系列经济支持措施和有针对性的措施来支撑股市，包括削减印花税、放慢上市步伐以及让国家支持的资金购买股票。

In an apparent effort to calm the market, the official Shanghai Securities News reported on Wednesday that China's securities watchdog will promote reforms to attract more long-term capital into the market.翻译:官方《上海证券报》周三报道称，中国证券监管机构将推动改革，吸引更多长期资本进入市场，这显然是为了安抚市场。

And last week, state-owned China Reform Holdings Corp said it had started buying index funds to support the market, following a similar move by sovereign fund Central Huijin Investment.翻译:上周，国有国新控股公司表示，继主权基金中央汇金投资有限公司采取类似举措后，该公司已开始购买指数基金以支撑市场。

But, on the other side of the trade, the weakening prospects for the Chinese economy could prove hard to shake off as confidence remains low.翻译:但在贸易的另一面，由于信心依然低迷，中国经济前景疲软可能难以摆脱。

"The pressures on Chinese stocks and the economy more generally are likely to increase if the cost of insuring the sovereign debt continues to rise and bailouts begin," said Ryan Yonk, economist at the American Institute for Economic Research.翻译:美国经济研究所经济学家瑞安·永克表示：“如果主权债务的保险成本继续上升并且开始实施救助，中国股市和整体经济面临的压力可能会增加。”

Rob Carnell, Asia-Pacific Head of Research at ING said that China has used many tools already to drive up demand but with limited effect, "so getting people to regain confidence in this market is going to be really hard."翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)亚太区研究主管罗布·卡内尔(Rob Carnell)表示，中国已经使用了许多工具来拉动需求，但效果有限，“因此让人们重拾对这个市场的信心将非常困难。”

Ultimately, analysts warn, sentiment can only stabilise sustainably if China delivers a credible longer-term roadmap for solving the structural weaknesses that are curbing its growth potential.翻译:最终，分析师警告说，只有中国提供可靠的长期路线图来解决抑制其增长潜力的结构性弱点，市场情绪才能持续稳定。

"The priority for China now is to stabilize growth momentum and raise confidence for the future," said Calvin Zhang, senior portfolio manager at Federated Hermes.翻译:Federated Hermes高级投资组合经理Calvin Zhang表示：“中国现在的首要任务是稳定增长势头并增强对未来的信心。”

China should increase fiscal spending and address local governments' hidden debt, Zhang said.翻译:张说，中国应该增加财政支出并解决地方政府的隐性债务。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.

YUAN WORRIES

China's blue-chip index (.CSI300) hit its lowest level in nearly five years on Wednesday.翻译:中国蓝筹股指数（.CSI300）周三触及近五年来的最低水平。

Major state-owned banks also stepped up U.S. dollar selling very forcefully on Tuesday, and again on Wednesday. China's central bank has used various tools in recent months to stem the yuan's slide, including stronger fixings before the market open.翻译:主要国有银行周二和周三也大力加大了美元抛售力度。近几个月来，中国央行使用了各种工具来阻止人民币贬值，包括在开盘前加强中间价。

Still, outflow pressure remains high.翻译:尽管如此，资金流出压力仍然很高。

China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment in July-September, while Goldman Sachs data showed outflows from China reached $75 billion in September, the biggest monthly exodus since 2016.翻译:7月至9月，中国首次出现季度外国直接投资赤字，而高盛的数据显示，9月份中国的资金流出达到750亿美元，这是自2016年以来最大的月度资金外流。

Moody's outlook cut could raise the stakes further, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，穆迪下调前景可能会进一步增加风险。

"This is a blow to the already low investor confidence in China," said Qi Wang, chief investment officer of UOB Kay Hian's wealth management division in Hong Kong.翻译:大华继显香港财富管理部门首席投资官王琪表示：“这对中国本已低迷的投资者信心是一个打击。”

Sovereign credit is the foundation of Chinese assets, so the move "would certainly impact the yuan exchange rate, and reduce global investors' risk appetite."翻译:主权信用是中国资产的基础，因此此举“肯定会影响人民币汇率，并降低全球投资者的风险偏好”。

But not everyone is bearish.翻译:但并非所有人都看跌。

Rival ratings agencies Fitch Ratings and S&P Global Ratings have made no changes to their respective China credit ratings. Fitch affirmed China's A+ rating with a stable outlook in August, while S&P Global said on Wednesday it has retained China's A+ rating with a 'stable' outlook.翻译:竞争对手评级机构惠誉评级和标准普尔全球评级没有改变各自的中国信用评级。惠誉8月确认中国A+评级，展望稳定，标普全球周三表示维持中国A+评级，展望“稳定”。

Some market participants pointed to similar rating moves on the United States as having limited long-term market impact.翻译:一些市场参与者指出，美国类似的评级变动对长期市场影响有限。

"Just as most people shrugged off the U.S. downgrade, most investors will shrug off the China downgrade," said Jason Hsu, chief investment officer at Rayliant Global Advisors.翻译:“正如大多数人对美国评级下调不屑一顾一样，大多数投资者也会对中国评级下调不屑一顾，”瑞联全球顾问公司首席投资官 Jason Hsu 表示。

Reporting by Samuel Shen and Winni Zhou in Shanghai and Summer Zhen in Hong Kong; Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; additional reporting by Megan Davies in New York; Editing by Marius Zaharia and Shri Navaratnam翻译:Samuel Shen 和 Winni Zhou 在上海以及 Summer Zen 在香港的报道； Ankur Banerjee 在新加坡；梅根·戴维斯在纽约的补充报道；编辑：Marius Zaharia 和 Shri Navaratnam

item.title: 意大利奢侈品牌普拉达 (Prada) 计划在中期内将中国业务扩大一倍
item.description:
Prada is looking to double its business in key luxury market China, Chief Executive Gianfranco D'Attis said on Wednesday, even as the country faces slowing growth in luxury demand and significant economic headwinds.翻译:首席执行官吉安弗兰科·达蒂斯 (Gianfranco D'Attis) 周三表示，尽管中国面临奢侈品需求增长放缓和重大经济逆风，普拉达仍希望将其在主要奢侈品市场中国的业务扩大一倍。

"We have a lot of ambitions here in China, to double our business in the upcoming mid-term future. And with that comes also increasing our investments," D'Attis told reporters in Shanghai.翻译:“我们在中国有很多雄心壮志，希望在即将到来的中期将我们的业务翻一番。随之而来的是我们的投资增加，”达蒂斯在上海告诉记者。

He did not give an exact timeframe for the ambition but said increased investments would not necessarily mean a major uptick in the number of stores opening across the country.翻译:他没有给出具体的时间表，但表示增加投资并不一定意味着全国开设的商店数量大幅增加。

"Not only the number of stores is important to us, but the quality of stores, bigger stores with more categories, with more localized products, with more experiences, with more hospitality, more events, more special capsules," he said.翻译:他说：“对我们来说，重要的不仅是商店数量，还有商店的质量，更大的商店，更多的品类，更多的本地化产品，更多的体验，更多的热情款待，更多的活动，更多特别的胶囊。”

D'Attis, a former Dior executive who took the helm at Prada in January, was speaking at a preview of the brand's Pradasphere II exhibition in Shanghai. This is the second iteration of a concept that first showed in London.翻译:迪奥 (Dior) 前高管、一月份执掌普拉达 (Prada) 的达蒂斯 (D'Attis) 在上海举行的该品牌 Pradasphere II 展览预览会上发表讲话。这是首次在伦敦展示的概念的第二次迭代。

As well as a deep dive into the brand's archive and identity, Pradasphere II, which is showing at a museum on Shanghai's Huangpu River, also includes a Prada-themed cafe and a gift shop in a repurposed train parked alongside the museum.翻译:除了深入了解该品牌的档案和身份之外，在上海黄浦江边的一家博物馆展出的 Pradasphere II 还包括一家 Prada 主题咖啡馆和停在博物馆旁边的改装火车内的礼品店。

According to D'Attis, this likely won't be the last time fans of the brand in China get to enjoy something like the Prada cafe, which boasts premium Italian coffee. Developing a hospitality concept is on the agenda for the brand worldwide, including in China, he said, possibly in 2024 or 2025.翻译:达蒂斯表示，这可能不会是该品牌的中国粉丝最后一次享受像 Prada 咖啡馆这样的地方，那里提供优质的意大利咖啡。他表示，发展酒店理念已列入该品牌在全球（包括中国）的议程，可能会在 2024 年或 2025 年进行。

The Prada Group, whose brands also include classic English shoemaker Church's, reported a 10% rise in third quarter revenues in November, saying a strong performance in Asia and Europe helped to compensate for weakness in the Americas.翻译:Prada 集团旗下品牌还包括经典的英国鞋履制造商 Church's，该集团 11 月份公布的第三季度收入增长了 10%，称亚洲和欧洲的强劲表现有助于弥补美洲的疲软表现。

China is forecast to account for almost 40% of global luxury sales by 2030, according to consultants Bain.翻译:贝恩咨询公司预计，到 2030 年，中国奢侈品销售额将占全球奢侈品销售额的近 40%。

D'Attis is hopeful Chinese consumers will return to traveling and shopping in greater numbers in Europe, but said that wouldn't necessarily impact sales at home.翻译:达蒂斯希望更多的中国消费者将重返欧洲旅游和购物，但他表示这不一定会影响国内销售。

"Because we have such a different offer abroad than the local offer that we have, we believe that there is no cannibalization," he said.翻译:“因为我们在国外的报价与我们在当地的报价有很大不同，所以我们相信不会出现蚕食的情况，”他说。

"They will continue to spend locally, they will continue to be treated like kings and queens in China and when they travel, they get a different product... than they can find in China. So it's very complementary."翻译:“他们将继续在当地消费，他们将继续在中国享受国王和王后般的待遇，当他们旅行时，他们会得到与在中国不同的产品。所以这是非常互补的。”

Prada is not alone in remaining optimistic about China's post-pandemic market. Even as luxury growth slows in the world's second-largest economy, spooking investors, global brands from Louis Vuitton to Chanel have all recently staged events in cities such as Shanghai and Shenzhen.翻译:Prada并不是唯一一家对疫情后的中国市场保持乐观态度的公司。尽管全球第二大经济体的奢侈品增长放缓， 令投资者感到不安，但从路易威登到香奈儿等全球品牌最近都在上海和深圳等城市举办了活动。

Reporting by Casey Hall and Beijing newsroom; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Mark Potter翻译:凯西·霍尔和北京新闻编辑室报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和马克·波特

item.title: 新疆审计后大众汽车股东要求加强审查
item.description:
Volkswagen must provide more transparency in its value chain and ensure its China operations are regularly reviewed, two of the carmaker's investors said on Wednesday, after an audit of its jointly owned Xinjiang site found no sign of forced labour.翻译:大众汽车公司的两名投资者周三表示，在对其合资的新疆工厂进行审计后，没有发现强迫劳动的迹象，大众汽车公司必须提高其价值链的透明度，并确保定期审查其中国业务。

The comments by Union Investment and Deka Investment reflect ongoing concern over Volkswagen's engagement in the Xinjiang region, where rights groups have documented abuses including forced labour in detention camps.翻译:联合投资和德卡投资的评论反映了人们对大众汽车在新疆地区参与的持续关注，人权组织记录了新疆地区的虐待行为，包括拘留营中的强迫劳动。

Beijing denies any such abuses.翻译:北京否认有任何此类侵权行为。

Volkswagen late on Tuesday said that the much-anticipated audit, carried out by Germany's Loening Human Rights & Responsible Business GmbH and two Chinese lawyers from a firm in Shenzhen, had provided no evidence of forced labour.翻译:大众汽车周二晚些时候表示，由德国鲁宁人权与责任商业有限公司和深圳一家公司的两名中国律师进行的备受期待的审计没有提供强迫劳动的证据。

While calling the audit a step in the right direction, Henrik Pontzen, who heads sustainability and ESG at Union Investment, said Volkswagen had not yet reached its goal.翻译:Union Investment 可持续发展和 ESG 主管 Henrik Pontzen 称此次审计是朝着正确方向迈出的一步，但他表示大众汽车尚未实现其目标。

"There is still a lot to do: In China, audits must not remain a one-off exercise. A functioning complaints management system must also be established. The weak corporate governance at VW also remains an Achilles heel," he said in a statement.翻译:他在一份声明中表示：“还有很多工作要做：在中国，审计不能只是一次性的。还必须建立有效的投诉管理体系。大众公司治理薄弱仍然是一个致命弱点。” 。

Welcoming the audit, Ingo Speich of Deka Investment, which according to LSEG data owns $99 million worth of Volkswagen's preferred stock, said more transparency was desirable regarding Volkswagen's supply chain.翻译:Deka Investment 的 Ingo Speich 对此次审计表示欢迎。根据 LSEG 的数据，Deka Investment 拥有价值 9900 万美元的大众优先股，他表示大众的供应链需要更高的透明度。

Reporting by Victoria Waldersee, Writing by Christoph Steitz, Editing by Linda Pasquini翻译:维多利亚·瓦尔德西 (Victoria Waldersee) 报道，克里斯托夫·施泰茨 (Christoph Steitz) 撰稿，琳达·帕斯奎尼 (Linda Pasquini) 编辑

item.title: 市场权衡欧佩克+减产与中国需求担忧，油价保持稳定
item.description:
Summary:
  • Oil prices stable on Wednesday after four-day losing streak
  • Russia's Vladimir Putin flies to UAE, Saudi Arabia on Wednesday
  • China trade data scheduled for Thursday after Moody's downgrade
翻译:概括：
  • 油价在连续四天下跌后周三稳定
  • 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京周三飞往阿联酋和沙特阿拉伯
  • 穆迪下调评级后中国贸易数据定于周四公布

Oil prices were steady on Wednesday, as investors weighed the effectiveness of an extension in OPEC+ cuts in tightening supply against a worsening demand outlook in China.翻译:周三油价保持稳定，投资者权衡欧佩克+延长减产收紧供应的有效性以及中国需求前景恶化的情况。

Brent crude futures fell 5 cents, or 0.06%, to $77.15 a barrel by 0900 GMT. U.S. WTI crude futures fell by 16 cents, or 0.22%, to $72.16 a barrel.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 0900，布伦特原油期货下跌 5 美分，至每桶 77.15 美元，跌幅为 0.06%。美国WTI原油期货下跌16美分，跌幅0.22%，至每桶72.16美元。

The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and allies such as Russia (OPEC+) agreed on voluntary output cuts of about 2.2 million barrels per day (bpd) for the first quarter of 2024 late last week.翻译:石油输出国组织和俄罗斯等盟国 (OPEC+) 上周晚些时候同意在 2024 年第一季度自愿减产约 220 万桶/日。

Saudi and Russian officials added this week that the cuts could be extended or deepened beyond March.翻译:沙特和俄罗斯官员本周补充称，减产可能会延长或深化至三月之后。

But both benchmarks closed at their lowest level since July 6 in the previous session, on a run of four straight days of losses.翻译:但两个基准指数均收于前一交易日 7 月 6 日以来的最低水平，连续四天下跌。

"The decision to further reduce output from January failed to stimulate the market and the recent, seemingly coordinated, assurances from Saudi Arabia and Russia to extend the constraints beyond 1Q 2024 or even deepen the cuts if needed have also fallen to deaf ears," PVM analyst Tamas Varga said.翻译:PVM 表示：“从 1 月份开始进一步减产的决定未能刺激市场，沙特阿拉伯和俄罗斯最近看似协调一致地保证将限制措施延长至 2024 年第一季度之后，甚至在必要时进一步减产，但这些承诺也被置若罔闻。”分析师塔马斯·瓦尔加表示。

Concerns over China's economic health, which could limit overall fuel demand in the world's second largest oil consumer, also weighed on prices.翻译:对中国经济健康状况的担忧可能会限制全球第二大石油消费国的整体燃料需求，这也打压了价格。

Rating agency Moody's lowered the outlook on China's A1 rating to negative from stable on Tuesday, citing "increased risks related to structurally and persistently lower medium-term economic growth and the ongoing downsizing of the property sector".翻译:评级机构穆迪周二将中国 A1 评级展望从稳定下调至负面，理由是“与结构性和持续较低的中期经济增长以及房地产行业持续缩减相关的风险增加”。

China will release preliminary trade data, including crude oil import data, on Thursday. Earlier expectations showed China's refinery runs to have declined in November.翻译:中国将于周四公布初步贸易数据，包括原油进口数据。此前的预期显示， 11 月份中国炼油厂开工量有所下降。

Russian president Vladimir Putin travels to the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia on Wednesday to meet with the UAE's President Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.翻译:俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京周三前往阿拉伯联合酋长国和沙特阿拉伯，会见阿联酋总统谢赫·穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬和沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼。

Oil and the OPEC+ agreement will be on the agenda, the Kremlin said.翻译:克里姆林宫表示，石油和欧佩克+协议将提上议程。

Reporting by Robert Harvey in London, Andrew Hayley in Beijing and Trixie Yap in Singapore, Editing by Elaine Hardcastle翻译:Robert Harvey 在伦敦、Andrew Hayley 在北京、Trixie Yap 在新加坡报道，Elaine Hardcastle 编辑

item.title: 中国媒体称穆迪“有偏见”，政府反应较为克制
item.description:
Chinese state media called Moody's "biased" on Wednesday for its negative rating outlook on the world's No. 2 economy, but some analysts said the government's official reaction was more restrained, signalling Beijing's own worries about surging debt.翻译:中国官方媒体周三称穆迪对世界第二大经济体的负面评级前景“有偏见”，但一些分析师表示，政府的官方反应较为克制，这表明北京方面对债务激增感到担忧。

Chinese officials often respond with aggressive statements to international scrutiny. After Moody's and S&P Global's previous outlook cuts in 2016, then finance minister Lou Jiwei slammed the ratings agencies as "biased" during a G20 meeting in Washington.翻译:中国官员经常以咄咄逼人的言论回应国际社会的审查。 2016年穆迪和标普全球下调展望后，时任财政部长楼继伟在华盛顿举行的G20会议上抨击评级机构“存在偏见”。

But in the official statement responding to Moody's move on Tuesday, the ministry only expressed "disappointment." On Wednesday, a foreign ministry spokesperson said China is capable of deepening reform and addressing its challenges, and that it welcomed "all friends" from "all over the world" to invest in its economy.翻译:但在周二回应穆迪此举的官方声明中，商务部仅表示“失望”。周三，外交部发言人表示，中国有能力深化改革、应对挑战，欢迎“世界各地”的“所有朋友”投资中国经济。

Alfred Wu, associate professor at the Lee Kwan Yew School of Public Policy at the National University of Singapore, said that while Chinese propaganda still aimed to show strength to a domestic audience, the more nuanced tone from the government was targeted at the international community.翻译:新加坡国立大学李光耀公共政策学院副教授阿尔弗雷德·吴表示，虽然中国的宣传仍然旨在向国内受众展示实力，但政府更加微妙的语气是针对国际社会的。

Wu said this was a sign that China takes on board global concerns about its weakening growth prospects and "wants to be seen as credible and responsible" in dealing with the issue.翻译:吴表示，这表明中国接受了全球对其增长前景疲软的担忧，并在处理这一问题时“希望被视为可信和负责任”。

"The discourse of China's rise was so strong in 2017. The sentiment has changed dramatically," Wu said.翻译:“2017年有关中国崛起的讨论如此强烈。人们的情绪发生了巨大变化，”吴说。

"The finance ministry recognises this, and that it needs to come up with a more professional response than it did before."翻译:“财政部认识到了这一点，并且需要拿出比以前更专业的回应。”

While keeping China's sovereign rating at A1, Moody's cut its outlook to negative from stable, citing surging local debt and property market woes, conditions which many economists have warned are pushing the economy to Japan-like decades of stagnation.翻译:穆迪在维持中国主权评级为A1的同时，将其前景从稳定下调至负面，理由是地方债务激增和房地产市场困境，许多经济学家警告称，这些情况正在将中国经济推向日本式的数十年停滞。

Alicia Garcia Herrero, chief economist for Asia Pacific at Natixis, also said she was "expecting a very different reaction" from China.翻译:法国外贸银行(Natixis)亚太区首席经济学家艾丽西亚·加西亚·埃雷罗(Alicia Garcia Herrero)也表示，她“预计中国会做出截然不同的反应”。

"It was handled very smoothly," she said. "Once you take the decision that 'my deficit is going to be much bigger', there's no point reacting (to Moody's)."翻译:“事情处理得非常顺利，”她说。 “一旦你决定‘我的赤字将会更大’，（对穆迪）做出反应就没有意义了。”

The Communist Party's nationalist tabloid Global Times published an article citing economists as saying Moody's decision was "biased and unprofessional, as it grossly exaggerated or manufactured risks and challenges."翻译:共产党的民族主义小报《环球时报》发表文章，援引经济学家的话说，穆迪的决定“有偏见、不专业，严重夸大或制造了风险和挑战”。

Moody's did not immediately respond to questions on Chinese media criticism and the official reaction.翻译:穆迪没有立即回应有关中国媒体批评和官方反应的问题。

Economic Daily, a state-run newspaper, also said Moody's took "biased" conclusions.翻译:官方报纸《经济日报》也表示，穆迪得出的结论“有偏见”。

But the Global Times' former editor Hu Xijin, who remains a prominent Chinese commentator, wrote a blog post to praise the "restraint" in the finance ministry's response, saying the tone was "very commendable."翻译:但仍是著名中国评论员的《环球时报》前编辑胡锡进写了一篇博文赞扬财政部的“克制”回应，称语气“非常值得赞扬”。

Hu said it was more important to boost "domestic confidence" than "devote energy to arguing whether this (Moody's move) is a 'conspiracy' or not," adding this could be achieved by strengthening China's post-pandemic recovery and resolving municipal debt and real estate risks.翻译:胡锦涛表示，提振“国内信心”比“花精力争论这（穆迪此举）是否是‘阴谋’”更重要，他补充说，这可以通过加强中国的疫情后复苏和解决市政债务和债务问题来实现。房地产风险。

"We can't expect an American rating company to find a way to convey confidence in China to the world. This work can only be done by China itself," Hu said.翻译:“我们不能指望一家美国评级公司找到一种方式向世界传达对中国的信心。这项工作只能由中国自己完成，”胡说。

Reporting by Joe Cash Editing by Shri Navaratnam翻译:乔·卡什 (Joe Cash) 报道 Shri Navaratnam 编辑

item.title: 王毅同布林肯强调推动中美关系稳定健康发展
item.description:
China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Wednesday that promoting healthy, stable and sustainable China-U.S. relations is an important task, in a phone call with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三在与美国国务卿布林肯通电话时表示，推动中美关系健康稳定可持续是一项重要任务。

Blinken also discussed his recent travel in the Middle East and U.S. diplomatic efforts in the region with Wang, according to an earlier statement from the U.S. Department of State.翻译:根据美国国务院早些时候的声明，布林肯还与王毅讨论了他最近的中东之行以及美国在该地区的外交努力。

In the call, the two top diplomats exchanged views on the Israeli-Hamas conflict and agreed to maintain communication on the situation in the Middle East, according to a Chinese foreign ministry statement.翻译:据中国外交部声明称，两国高级外交官在通话中就以色列与哈马斯冲突交换了意见，并同意就中东局势保持沟通。

Wang said during the conversation that the top priority at the moment is to cease fire and cease fighting "as soon as possible."翻译:王毅在谈话中表示，当前当务之急是“尽快”停火、停止战斗。

Blinken also thanked Wang for going to the U.S. Embassy in China to express his condolences to former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger, said the Chinese foreign ministry.翻译:中国外交部表示，布林肯还感谢王毅前往美国驻华使馆向美国前国务卿基辛格表示慰问。

Henry Kissinger, the most powerful U.S. diplomat of the Cold War era, who helped Washington open up to China, died last week.翻译:冷战时期美国最有权势的外交官、帮助华盛顿向中国开放的亨利·基辛格上周去世。

"Dr. Kissinger has always advocated that China and the United States should respect each other, evolve together, and fulfill their international responsibilities," Wang was quoted as saying in the phone call.翻译:王毅在电话中表示：“基辛格博士一贯主张中美应相互尊重、共同发展、履行国际责任。”

Wang also repeatedly stressed that the United States should fully understand the importance of the Taiwan issue to China, and that Kissinger's diplomatic legacy is worthy of being carried forward and developed by future generations.翻译:王毅还多次强调，美国应充分认识台湾问题对中国的重要性，基辛格的外交遗产值得后人继承和发展。

Wang and Blinken also emphasised the importance of building upon progress made on key issues in the summit between the countries' respective presidents in California in November, according to statements from their respective departments.翻译:根据各自部门的声明，王毅和布林肯还强调了在 11 月两国总统在加州举行的峰会上在关键问题上取得进展的重要性。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Kim Coghill翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 中国称其战机在台湾海峡跟踪美国海军巡逻机
item.description:
China's military said on Wednesday it sent fighter jets to monitor and warn a U.S. Navy patrol aircraft that flew over the sensitive Taiwan Strait, a mission that took place weeks before Taiwan holds elections.翻译:中国军方周三表示，已派出战斗机对飞越敏感的台湾海峡的美国海军巡逻机进行监视和警告，这项任务是在台湾举行选举前几周执行的。

China claims sovereignty over democratically governed Taiwan, and says it has jurisdiction over the strait. Taiwan and the United States dispute that, saying the Taiwan Strait is an international waterway.翻译:中国声称对民主治理的台湾拥有主权，并表示对该海峡拥有管辖权。台湾和美国对此存在争议，称台湾海峡是国际水道。

The U.S. Navy's 7th Fleet said the P-8A Poseidon maritime patrol and reconnaissance plane, which is also used for anti-submarine missions, flew over the strait in international airspace.翻译:美国海军第七舰队表示，P-8A海神海上巡逻侦察机也用于反潜任务，在国际空域飞越了海峡。

"The aircraft's transit of the Taiwan Strait demonstrates the United States' commitment to a free and open Indo-Pacific. The United States military flies, sails and operates anywhere international law allows," it said in a statement.翻译:“这架飞机飞越台湾海峡表明了美国对自由开放的印太地区的承诺。美国军队在国际法允许的任何地方飞行、航行和行动，”它在一份声明中说。

China's military described the flight as "public hype", adding it had sent fighters to monitor and warn the U.S. plane and "deal with it in accordance with the law and regulations".翻译:中国军方称此次飞行是“公开炒作”，并补充说已派出战机对美机进行监视和警告，并“依法依规予以处理”。

"Troops in the theatre are always on high alert and will resolutely defend national sovereignty and security as well as regional peace and stability," the Eastern Theatre Command of the People's Liberation Army said in a statement.翻译:解放军东部战区在声明中表示，战区部队始终保持高度戒备，坚决捍卫国家主权安全和地区和平稳定。

Taiwan's defence ministry said its forces monitored the U.S. aircraft as it flew in south through the strait, and described the situation as "normal".翻译:台湾国防部表示，当美国飞机向南飞经海峡时，台湾部队对其进行了监视，并称情况“正常”。

The last time the U.S. Navy announced a Poseidon had flown through the strait, in October, China said it had sent fighter jets to monitor and warn the aircraft.翻译:上次美国海军宣布波塞冬飞机飞越该海峡是在10月份，中国表示已派出战斗机对飞机进行监视和警告。

Taiwan is gearing up for presidential and parliamentary elections on Jan. 13, which China has cast as a choice between war and peace.翻译:台湾正在为 1 月 13 日的总统和议会选举做准备，中国将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。

China has stepped up its military activity around Taiwan in the past four years, including staging two rounds of major war games over the last year and a half.翻译:过去四年来，中国加强了在台湾周边的军事活动，包括在过去一年半的时间里举行了两轮大型军演。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Additional reporting by Ben Blanchard in Taipei; Editing by Kim Coghill and Gerry Doyle翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道； Ben Blanchard 在台北的补充报道；金·科吉尔和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 独家：中海油、维托公司入围壳牌新加坡资产候选名单
item.description:
Shell (SHEL.L) has shortlisted at least four companies including state-run China National Offshore Oil Corp (CNOOC) and top global energy trader Vitol as bidders for its Singapore refinery assets, sources with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:据知情人士透露，壳牌(SHEL.L)已将至少四家公司列入候选名单，其中包括国有的中国海洋石油总公司 (CNOOC) 和全球顶级能源贸易商维多 (Vitol)，作为其新加坡炼油厂资产的竞标者。

Two privately controlled Chinese chemical producers - Eversun Holdings in Fujian province and Shandong province-based Befar Group - were also shortlisted, sources said.翻译:消息人士称，两家私营中国化学品生产商——福建省的永盛控股和山东省的滨化集团——也入围。

The companies have been asked to submit formal bids by the end of February, two of the sources said. Two sources also said Shell aims to close a transaction by the end of 2024.翻译:两位消息人士称，这些公司已被要求在二月底之前提交正式投标。两位消息人士还表示，壳牌计划在 2024 年底前完成交易。

The assets include a 237,000 barrels per day (bpd) refinery and a one million metric ton per year (tpy) ethylene plant on Singapore's Bukom island. Shell announced a strategic review of the assets in June and sources have previously said that Goldman Sachs has been hired to manage a potential sale.翻译:这些资产包括位于新加坡 Bukom 岛的一座日产 237,000 桶 (bpd) 的炼油厂和一座每年 100 万吨 (tpy) 的乙烯厂。壳牌于六月宣布对资产进行战略审查，此前有消息人士称，已聘请高盛来管理潜在的出售。

Reuters spoke with six sources for this article. All declined to be identified as the deal discussions were confidential.翻译:路透社采访了本文的六位消息来源。由于交易讨论是保密的，所有人都拒绝透露姓名。

It was not clear how much Shell is seeking for the assets.翻译:目前尚不清楚壳牌为这些资产寻求的金额是多少。

A Shell spokesperson said that following the company's strategic review "divestment is our priority focus now." The spokesperson declined to comment on potential suitors for the assets or a timeline for the sale.翻译:壳牌发言人表示，在公司进行战略审查后，“撤资是我们现在的首要任务。”该发言人拒绝就资产的潜在买家或出售时间表发表评论。

Goldman Sachs declined to comment. CNOOC, Vitol, Befar and Eversun did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:高盛拒绝置评。中海油、Vitol、Befar 和 EVERSUN 均未回应置评请求。

When Shell's Bukom facility opened in 1961 it was Singapore's first refinery and was once Shell's biggest refining-petrochemical complex globally.翻译:壳牌的 Bukom 工厂于 1961 年开业，是新加坡第一家炼油厂，也曾是壳牌全球最大的炼油石化联合企业。

A buyer of the assets on Bukom and Jurong islands would gain a foothold in Asia's main oil trading hub but would also face competition from newer refineries in China and elsewhere. The buyer would also have to contend with an expected sharp rise in Singapore's carbon tax in 2024 that would add to the costs of running the plants.翻译:武公岛和裕廊岛资产的买家将在亚洲主要石油贸易中心站稳脚跟，但也将面临来自中国和其他地方新建炼油厂的竞争。买家还必须应对预计 2024 年新加坡碳税大幅上涨的问题，这将增加工厂的运营成本。

China's Wanhua Chemical (600309.SS), which Reuters reported in October was among companies making early evaluations of the assets, did not submit an initial bid, two of the sources said.

POTENTIAL STORAGE HUB?

CNOOC, which has a long-term partnership with Shell in a petrochemicals venture in south China, has been looking to boost its downstream portfolio and expand its global oil and chemicals trading, said a person familiar with CNOOC's thinking.翻译:一位了解中海油想法的人士表示，中海油与壳牌在华南的一家石化企业建立了长期合作伙伴关系，一直在寻求扩大其下游产品组合并扩大其全球石油和化学品贸易。

"But still, CNOOC will face internal scrutiny as all Chinese state-owned enterprises face the pressure from Beijing to add value to assets, rather than lose," said the person. "So price will be the key," the person added.翻译:“但是，中海油仍将面临内部审查，因为所有中国国有企业都面临着来自北京的压力，要求资产增值，而不是亏损，”该人士表示。 “因此价格将是关键，”该人士补充道。

For Switzerland's Vitol, Shell's Singapore site may be attractive as an oil storage and distribution hub.翻译:对于瑞士维托公司来说，壳牌的新加坡基地作为石油储存和分销中心可能很有吸引力。

"Trading companies could be considering purchasing Shell’s Bukom assets for the tank storage and marine terminals if it is more cost-effective in the long-term compared to leasing third-party storage," said Ivan Mathews, head of Asia refining at analytics firm FGE.翻译:分析公司 FGE 亚洲炼油业务主管伊万·马修斯 (Ivan Mathews) 表示：“如果从长远来看，与租赁第三方存储相比更具成本效益，贸易公司可以考虑购买壳牌的 Bukom 油罐存储和海运码头资产。” 。

"Moreover, it provides more trading and operational flexibility compared to leasing due to ownership of tanks and terminals," he added.翻译:“此外，由于拥有储罐和码头，与租赁相比，它提供了更多的交易和运营灵活性，”他补充道。

Vitol posted a record $15 billion profit last year and has invested in over 500,000 bpd of refining capacity in Malaysia, Australia, Europe and the Middle East.翻译:维多去年实现了创纪录的 150 亿美元利润，并在马来西亚、澳大利亚、欧洲和中东投资了超过 50 万桶/日的炼油产能。

The other two shortlisted companies are much smaller and lack experience investing outside China.翻译:另外两家入围公司规模小得多，缺乏在中国境外投资的经验。

Eversun is set to schedule a site visit around end-December or early January, a source familiar with the company said.翻译:一位熟悉该公司的消息人士称，Eversun 计划于 12 月底或 1 月初左右进行现场考察。

Asian firms operating refinery-petrochemical complexes are profiting from refined products. But petrochemicals such as ethylene glycol and styrene monomer - feedstocks for plastics and synthetic fibre produced at plants such as Shell Bukom - have not been profitable for the past two years, analysts say.翻译:经营炼油石化联合体的亚洲公司正在从炼油产品中获利。但分析人士表示，乙二醇和苯乙烯单体等石化产品——壳牌 Bukom 等工厂生产的塑料和合成纤维的原料——在过去两年中并未盈利。

A report by Wood Mackenzie said that 2022 net cash margins for Shell's Bukom assets were below a global weighted industry average of $14 a barrel for the company's integrated refinery-petrochemical complexes, while ethylene production costs were among Shell's highest globally.翻译:Wood Mackenzie 的一份报告称，壳牌 Bukom 资产 2022 年净利润率低于该公司一体化炼油石化联合体每桶 14 美元的全球加权行业平均水平，而乙烯生产成本是壳牌全球最高的之一。

($1 = 7.1366 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1366 人民币）

Reporting by Chen Aizhu and Trixie Yap; Editing by Tony Munroe and Edwina Gibbs翻译:陈爱珠、Trixie Yap 报道；托尼·芒罗和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑

item.title: 路透调查显示，随着部分需求的出现，中国出口下滑放缓
item.description:
Declines in China's exports likely slowed in November, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, amid mixed signs factories in the world's second-largest economy may be finding their footing after a bruising slump in demand.翻译:路透周三的一项民意调查显示，中国11月份的出口降幅可能会放缓，有好坏参半的迹象表明，全球第二大经济体的工厂在需求严重下滑后可能正在站稳脚跟。

Outbound shipments from China are expected to show a 1.1% drop in November from a year earlier, following a 6.4% fall in October and continuing the trend of narrowing declines for the fourth straight month, according to the median forecast of 28 economists polled.翻译:根据接受调查的 28 名经济学家的预测中值，继 10 月份下降 6.4% 后，预计 11 月份中国出境货运量将同比下降 1.1%，并延续连续第四个月降幅收窄的趋势。

Mixed manufacturing data for November has kept alive calls for further policy support to shore up growth but also raised questions about whether predominantly negative sentiment-based surveys reflected improvements in conditions.翻译:11 月份好坏参半的制造业数据引发了人们对进一步政策支持以提振增长的呼声，但也引发了人们的疑问：主要基于负面情绪的调查是否反映了经济状况的改善。

A run of mostly upbeat data from October suggest support measures trickling out of Beijing since June bolstered a tentative economic recovery, even if a protracted property crisis and soft global demand continue to dog policymakers.翻译:10 月份的一系列基本乐观的数据表明，自 6 月份以来北京陆续出台的支持措施支撑了经济的初步复苏，尽管旷日持久的房地产危机和全球需求疲软继续困扰着政策制定者。

Consequently, the International Monetary Fund in November upgraded its China growth forecasts for 2023 and 2024 by 0.4% percentage points each.翻译:因此，国际货币基金组织11月将中国2023年和2024年的增长预测分别上调0.4个百分点。

But Moody's on Tuesday slapped a downgrade warning on China's credit rating. The contrasting takes on the health of the economy were apparent in the poll.翻译:但穆迪周二对中国信用评级发出下调警告。民意调查中明显体现出对经济健康状况的截然不同的看法。

Morgan Stanley projected that China's exports grew by as much as 2.0% in November, while Citigroup forecast a 1.0% increase. Barclays, Oxford Economics and ANZ, however, anticipate exports dropped by 5.0%, 4.7%, and 4.6%, respectively, last month.翻译:摩根士丹利预计中国11月出口增幅高达2.0%，而花旗集团则预测增幅为1.0%。然而，巴克莱银行、牛津经济研究院和澳新银行预计上个月出口将分别下降 5.0%、4.7% 和 4.6%。

Analysts warn that China's economy is running at different speeds across different industries, but point to a cyclical upturn in the global electronics sector as particular cause for optimism among Chinese manufacturers.翻译:分析师警告说，中国经济在不同行业的运行速度不同，但指出全球电子行业的周期性好转是中国制造商感到乐观的一个特别原因。

South Korea's exports, a bellwether for global trade, rose for a second month in November, buoyed by chip exports, which snapped 15 months of declines.翻译:作为全球贸易领头羊的韩国出口在 11 月份连续第二个月增长，受到芯片出口的提振，芯片出口结束了 15 个月的下降。

But South Korean exports to China, a leading indicator of China's imports, fell 0.2%.翻译:但韩国对中国的出口（中国进口的领先指标）下降了0.2%。

China's imports are expected to have grown by 3.3%, extending October's gains, reflecting improving domestic demand.翻译:中国进口预计增长 3.3%，延续 10 月份的涨幅，反映出内需改善。

The median estimate in the poll indicated that China's trade surplus would increase, with analysts predicting it would come in at $58.00 billion, compared with $56.53 billion in October.翻译:调查的中值估计显示，中国的贸易顺差将增加，分析师预测其贸易顺差将达到 580 亿美元，而 10 月份为 565.3 亿美元。

China's trade data will be released on Thursday.翻译:中国贸易数据将于周四公布。

Reporting by Joe Cash; Polling by Milounee Purohit and Anant Chandak in Bangalore; Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:乔·卡什报道； Milounee Purohit 和 Anant Chandak 在班加罗尔进行的民意调查；山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 尼泊尔警方因指控将青少年送往俄罗斯军队而拘留了10人
item.description:
Police in Nepal have detained 10 people they say charged unemployed youths huge amounts of money for travel visas, then sent them for illegal recruitment into the Russian army, an official said on Wednesday.翻译:一名官员周三表示，尼泊尔警方拘留了 10 人，称他们向失业青年收取巨额旅行签证费用，然后将他们送入俄罗斯军队非法招募。

Nepal asked Moscow this week not to recruit its citizens into the Russian army, and to send any Nepali soldier in its armed forces back to the Himalayan nation after six of its citizens serving in Russia's military were killed.翻译:尼泊尔本周要求莫斯科不要招募其公民加入俄罗斯军队，并在六名在俄罗斯军队服役的尼泊尔公民被杀后，将其武装部队中的任何尼泊尔士兵送回喜马拉雅山国家。

Kathmandu District Police chief Bhupendra Khatri said 10 people were in police custody after being detained over the past few days following tip-offs.翻译:加德满都地区警察局长 Bhupendra Khatri 表示，过去几天接到举报后，有 10 人被警方拘留。

"We are discussing with the government lawyers about the case and will produce them to the court," Khatri told Reuters. He did not say when they would appear in court.翻译:卡特里告诉路透社：“我们正在与政府律师讨论此案，并将其提交给法庭。”他没有透露他们何时出庭。

Khatri said the detainees illegally charged each person up to $9,000 and sent them to Russia on "visit (tourist) visas", mainly through the UAE. They were then recruited into the Russian army.翻译:卡特里表示，被拘留者非法向每人收取高达 9000 美元的费用，并主要通过阿联酋以“访问（旅游）签证”将他们送往俄罗斯。随后他们被征召加入俄罗斯军队。

"It is a case of human smuggling ... organised crime," Khatri added.翻译:“这是一起人口走私案件……有组织犯罪，”卡特里补充道。

The detainees could not be immediately reached for comment.翻译:记者未能立即联系到被拘留者置评。

Nepal, which lies between China and India, has asked Russia, which invaded neighbouring Ukraine in February 2022 and has been engaged in a war since, to compensate the families of the Nepali citizens killed.翻译:位于中国和印度之间的尼泊尔已要求俄罗斯赔偿遇难尼泊尔公民的家属。俄罗斯于2022年2月入侵邻国乌克兰，此后一直处于战争状态。

Nepali soldiers, called Gurkhas, are known for their bravery and fighting skills and have been serving the British and Indian armies after the independence of India in 1947 under an agreement among the three countries. There is no such agreement with Russia.翻译:尼泊尔士兵被称为“廓尔喀人”，以勇敢和战斗技巧而闻名，1947 年印度独立后，根据英印两国达成的协议，他们一直在英国和印度军队服役。与俄罗斯没有这样的协议。

Millions of Nepalis are employed in civilian work - mainly as labourers in industries and construction sites - in South Korea, Malaysia and the Middle East.翻译:数百万尼泊尔人在韩国、马来西亚和中东从事民事工作，主要是工业和建筑工地的劳工。

Reporting by Gopal Sharma. Editing by Shilpa Jamkhandikar and Gerry Doyle翻译:戈帕尔·夏尔马报道。编辑：Shilpa Jamkhandikar 和 Gerry Doyle
item.author: Gopal Sharma

item.title: 欧盟将在中国峰会上发表强硬言论，但预期有限
item.description:
Top EU officials will raise an array of concerns from Russia's invasion of Ukraine to trade irritants in a summit with Chinese leaders on Thursday that is expected to be long on firm words, but short on outcomes.翻译:欧盟高级官员将在周四与中国领导人举行的峰会上提出从俄罗斯入侵乌克兰到贸易刺激等一系列担忧，预计此次峰会将发表强硬言论，但缺乏成果。

European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen, European Council President Charles Michel and EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell meet Chinese President Xi Jinping in the morning and Premier Li Qiang in the afternoon on their one-day visit to Beijing.翻译:欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉·冯德莱恩、欧洲理事会主席查尔斯·米歇尔和欧盟外交政策负责人何塞普·博雷尔上午会见了中国国家主席习近平，下午会见了对北京进行一日访问的国务院总理李强。

There will be no joint statement from Thursday's talks, EU officials said, and they do not expect concrete outcomes from the first in-person EU-China summit since 2019.翻译:欧盟官员表示，周四的会谈不会发表联合声明，他们预计自 2019 年以来首次面对面的中欧峰会不会取得具体成果。

"There's not a single outstanding deliverable that will be crowning the summit," said one EU official翻译:一位欧盟官员表示：“没有任何一项突出的成果能够为峰会画上圆满句号。”

By contrast, Xi's meeting with U.S. President Joe Biden in California in November did produce agreements, although simmering differences remained, particularly over Taiwan.翻译:相比之下， 习近平去年 11 月在加州与美国总统乔·拜登的会晤确实达成了协议，尽管分歧仍然存在，特别是在台湾问题上。

The European Union will also have questions on Chinese intentions towards Taiwan, but its focus will be on Russia's invasion of Ukraine.翻译:欧盟也会对中国对台湾的意图提出质疑，但重点将放在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰上。

The European Union wants Beijing to use its influence on Russia to stop the war, will stress the need to respect sanctions on Russia and will raise the issue of growing arms supply from North Korea to Russia.翻译:欧盟希望北京利用其对俄罗斯的影响力来制止战争，将强调必须尊重对俄罗斯的制裁，并将提出朝鲜向俄罗斯供应武器不断增加的问题。

The bloc is also concerned about what it considers "imbalanced" economic relations, saying its near 400 billion euro ($431.7 billion) trade deficit with China reflects restrictions on EU businesses.翻译:欧盟还对其认为的“不平衡”经济关系感到担忧，称其对中国近4000亿欧元（4317亿美元）的贸易逆差反映了对欧盟企业的限制。

China will be expected to ask about an EU anti-subsidy investigation into Chinese electric vehicles and about the EU's "de-risking" policy to reduce its reliance on Chinese imports, particularly of critical raw materials.翻译:预计中国将询问欧盟对中国电动汽车的反补贴调查，以及欧盟为减少对中国进口尤其是关键原材料的依赖而采取的“去风险”政策。

EU officials say the two sides could cooperate more on action to combat climate change and to promote biodiversity.翻译:欧盟官员表示，双方可以在应对气候变化和促进生物多样性的行动上进行更多合作。

They also point to a series of dialogues set up on macro-economics and trade. These include the EU's planned CO2 emissions import tariff and the circular economy, a possible increase in the number of food products whose names would be protected - such as only applying the term "feta" to a specific Greek cheese.翻译:他们还指出了一系列有关宏观经济和贸易的对话。其中包括欧盟计划的二氧化碳排放进口关税和循环经济，可能增加名称受保护的食品数量，例如仅将“羊乳酪”一词应用于特定的希腊奶酪。

"These are not per se major summit deliverables ... but in certain areas there are mutual interests and we can make a difference by working technically and practically together," an EU official said.翻译:一位欧盟官员表示：“这些本身并不是峰会的主要成果……但在某些领域存在共同利益，我们可以通过技术和实际合作来发挥作用。”

($1 = 0.9265 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9265 欧元）

Reporting by Philip Blenkinsop; additional reporting by Andrew Gray in Brussels and Laurie Chen in Beijing; editing by Grant McCool翻译:菲利普·布伦金索普报道；安德鲁·格雷 (Andrew Gray) 在布鲁塞尔和劳里·陈 (Laurie Chen) 在北京进行了补充报道；格兰特·麦库尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国社交媒体发布穆迪中国评级下调的猜测
item.description:
Hours before Moody's downgraded the outlook for China's sovereign credit ratings on Tuesday, speculation that such a move was imminent was circulating on Chinese social media platform WeChat, a Reuters review shows.翻译:路透社的一篇评论显示，就在周二穆迪下调中国主权信用评级前景的几个小时前，中国社交媒体平台微信上流传着有关即将采取这一举措的猜测。

"It is said that Moody's will downgrade China's sovereign credit rating, and an announcement will be made in the afternoon," according to one WeChat post in Chinese translated by Reuters, in a chat group with several hundred people.翻译:路透社翻译的一篇微信帖子在一个数百人的聊天群中写道：“据说穆迪将下调中国的主权信用评级，下午就会发布公告。”

Moody's on Tuesday cut China's government outlook to negative from stable, stopping short of an outright downgrade. The rating agency cited growing evidence that authorities will have to step in to support debt-laden local governments and state firms, a move that could pose risks to the country's fiscal, economic and institutional strength.翻译:穆迪周二将中国政府的评级展望从稳定下调至负面，但并未彻底下调评级。该评级机构援引越来越多的证据表明，当局将不得不介入支持负债累累的地方政府和国有企业， 此举可能会给该国的财政、经济和机构实力带来风险。

China's blue-chip stocks slumped to nearly five-year lows on Tuesday amid worries about the country's growth, with talk of a possible cut by Moody's denting sentiment during the session, ahead of the release.翻译:由于对中国经济增长的担忧，中国蓝筹股周二跌至近五年来的低点，在发布消息之前，有关穆迪可能降息的言论削弱了市场情绪。

A Moody's spokesperson declined to comment.翻译:穆迪发言人拒绝置评。

Credit ratings actions by agencies such as Moody's, S&P Global and Fitch have sometimes been reported ahead of their scheduled release.翻译:穆迪、标准普尔全球和惠誉等机构的信用评级行动有时会提前公布。

In 2011, the decision of S&P Global to place the credit ratings of 15 eurozone countries, including Germany, France, and Austria, on a review for downgrade was published ahead of its release by the Financial Times.翻译:2011年，标准普尔全球公司在英国《金融时报》 发布之前就公布了对德国、法国、奥地利等15个欧元区国家信用评级进行降级审查的决定。

Ratings leaks are quite common but can be difficult to pin down since they can come from different sources, said Alexander Michaelides, professor of finance at Imperial College London, who has researched and published academic papers on the systematic leakage ahead of official sovereign debt rating announcements.翻译:伦敦帝国理工学院金融学教授亚历山大·米夏利德斯 (Alexander Michaelides) 表示，评级泄露很常见，但很难确定，因为它们可能来自不同的来源。他在官方主权债务评级公告之前研究并发表了有关系统性泄露的学术论文。 。

"It is quite common, but it is difficult to show that it has happened. And it happens in many countries around the world – even in countries with very high institutional quality," Michaelides said.翻译:“这很常见，但很难证明它已经发生过。而且这种情况发生在世界上许多国家——甚至是制度质量非常高的国家，”米夏利德斯说。

Writing by Chibuike Oguh in New York; additional reporting by Karin Strohecker in London; editing by Megan Davies and Nick Zieminski翻译:奇布伊克·奥古 (Chibuike Oguh) 在纽约撰写； Karin Strohecker 在伦敦的补充报道；梅根·戴维斯和尼克·齐明斯基编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着经济增长和房地产压力加大，穆迪对中国发出评级下调警告
item.description:
Ratings agency Moody's slapped a downgrade warning on China's credit rating on Tuesday, saying costs to bail out local governments and state firms and control its property crisis would weigh on the world's No. 2 economy.翻译:评级机构穆迪周二对中国信用评级发出下调警告，称救助地方政府和国有企业以及控制房地产危机的成本将给世界第二大经济体带来压力。

Moody's lowered the 'outlook' on China's A1 debt rating to "negative" from "stable" less than a month after it had done the same to the United States' last remaining triple-A grade from a credit rating agency.翻译:穆迪将中国 A1 债务评级的“前景”从“稳定”下调至“负面”不到一个月，此前该评级机构对美国最后一个信用评级机构 AAA 评级也进行了同样的调整。

Historically, about one-third of issuers have been downgraded within 18 months of the assignment of a negative rating outlook.翻译:从历史上看，大约三分之一的发行人在评级展望为负面后 18 个月内被下调。

Beijing likely needs to provide more support for debt-laden local governments and state firms which pose "broad downside risks to China's fiscal, economic and institutional strength," it added.翻译:报告补充称，北京可能需要为负债累累的地方政府和国有企业提供更多支持，因为它们“对中国的财政、经济和体制实力构成了广泛的下行风险”。

Moody's also cited "increased risks related to structurally and persistently lower medium-term economic growth and the ongoing downsizing of the property sector."翻译:穆迪还指出“与结构性和持续较低的中期经济增长以及房地产行业持续缩减相关的风险增加”。

China's Finance Ministry called the decision disappointing, saying the economy would rebound and that the property crisis and local government debt worries were controllable.翻译:中国财政部称这一决定令人失望，称经济将会反弹，房地产危机和地方政府债务担忧是可控的。

"Moody's concerns about China's economic growth prospects, fiscal sustainability and other aspects are unnecessary," the ministry said.翻译:“穆迪对中国经济增长前景、财政可持续性等方面的担忧是不必要的，”商务部表示。

Blue-chip stocks slumped nearly 2% to near five-year lows on growth worries, with some traders also citing speculation about Moody's statement before its release.翻译:由于增长担忧，蓝筹股下跌近 2%，至近五年低点，一些交易员还援引了穆迪声明发布前的猜测。

China's major state-owned banks, which had been supporting the yuan currency all day, stepped selling of U.S. dollars on the news, one source with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:一位知情人士称，一整天都在支持人民币的中国主要国有银行在这一消息后纷纷抛售美元。

The cost of insuring China's sovereign debt against a default rose to its highest since mid-November, while the U.S.-listed shares of heavyweight Chinese firms Alibaba and JD.com dropped 1% and 2%, respectively.翻译:中国主权债务违约的保险成本升至11月中旬以来的最高水平，而中国重量级企业阿里巴巴和京东在美国上市的股价分别下跌1%和2%。

"For now the markets are more concerned with the property crisis and weak growth, rather than the immediate sovereign debt risk," said Ken Cheung, chief Asian FX strategist at Mizuho Bank in Hong Kong.

NEGATIVE FEELINGS

It was the first change by Moody's to its China rating since downgrading it by one notch to A1 in 2017 when debt levels were rising.翻译:这是穆迪自2017年债务水平上升时将其中国评级下调一级至A1以来首次调整。

While Moody's affirmedthe A1 rating on Tuesday, noting that the economy still had a high shock-absorption capacity, it estimated China's economic growth would slow to 4.0% in 2024 and 2025, and average 3.8% from 2026 to 2030.翻译:尽管穆迪周二确认了A1评级，并指出经济仍具有较高的冲击吸收能力，但预计2024年和2025年中国经济增速将放缓至4.0%，2026年至2030年平均增速为3.8%。

Moody's main peer, S&P Global, said later in a long-scheduled global outlook call that its big concern was that "spillovers" from any worsening in the property crisis could push China's gross domestic product growth "below 3%" next year.翻译:穆迪的主要同行标准普尔全球公司稍后在一场长期举行的全球展望电话会议中表示，其最担心的是房地产危机恶化带来的“溢出效应”可能导致中国明年的国内生产总值增长“低于3%”。

China's government advisers are expected to call for more stimulus at the annual agenda-setting 'Central Economic Work Conference' due to be held in the next week or two.翻译:预计中国政府顾问将在未来一两周召开的年度议程“中央经济工作会议”上呼吁采取更多刺激措施。

Analysts say China's A1 rating is high enough in 'investment-grade' territory that a downgrade is unlikely to trigger forced selling by global funds.翻译:分析师表示，中国的 A1 评级在“投资级”领域已经足够高，评级下调不太可能引发全球基金的强制抛售。

S&P and Fitch, the other major global rating agency, both rate China A+, the equivalent of Moody's A1, and have stable outlooks.

STRUGGLING FOR TRACTION

Most analysts believe China's growth is on track to hit the government's target of around 5% this year, but that compares with a COVID-weakened 2022 and activity is highly uneven.翻译:大多数分析师认为，中国今年的经济增长有望实现政府设定的 5% 左右的目标，但与受新冠疫情影响的 2022 年相比， 经济活动极不平衡。

The economy has struggled to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery as the deepening housing crisis, local government debt concerns, slowing global growth and geopolitical tensions have curbed momentum.翻译:由于住房危机加剧、地方政府债务担忧、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势抑制了经济增长势头，疫情后经济难以实现强劲复苏。

A flurry of policy support measures have proven only modestly beneficial, raising pressure on authorities to roll out more stimulus.翻译:事实证明，一系列政策支持措施的效果有限，这加大了当局推出更多刺激措施的压力。

"We spent the better part of three years watching China have this sort of off-and-on reopening from the pandemic, and this was the year they finally sort of officially reopened," said Art Hogan, chief market strategist at B Riley Wealth in New York.翻译:B Riley Wealth 首席市场策略师阿特·霍根 (Art Hogan) 表示：“我们花了三年的大部分时间看着中国从疫情中断断续续地重新开放，今年他们终于正式重新开放了。”纽约。

"But the pace at which the economy has recovered from that has been disappointing."翻译:“但经济从中复苏的速度令人失望。”

Analysts widely agree that China's growth is slowing after the breakneck expansion of the past few decades. Many believe Beijing needs to transform its economic model from an over-reliance on debt-fuelled investment to one driven more by consumer demand.翻译:分析人士普遍认为，在经历了过去几十年的高速扩张之后，中国的经济增长正在放缓。许多人认为，北京需要将其经济模式从过度依赖债务驱动的投资转变为更多由消费者需求驱动的经济模式。

Last week, China's central bank head Pan Gongsheng pledged to keep monetary policy accommodative to support the economy, but also urged structural reforms to reduce reliance on infrastructure and property for growth.

DEEPER IN DEBT

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139.84 billion) in sovereign bonds by year-end to help kick-start activity, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of GDP from the original 3%.翻译:10月，中国公布了一项计划，将在年底前发行1万亿元人民币（1,398.4亿美元）的主权债券，以帮助启动经济活动，将2023年预算赤字目标从最初占GDP的3%提高到3.8%。

After years of over-investment, plummeting returns from land sales, and soaring costs to battle COVID, rating firms have been warning about the contingent liability risks of debt-laden Chinese municipalities.翻译:经过多年的过度投资、土地销售回报大幅下降以及抗击新冠疫情的成本飙升，评级公司一直对负债累累的中国地方政府的或有负债风险发出警告。

Local government debt reached 92 trillion yuan ($12.6 trillion), or 76% of China's economic output in 2022, up from 62.2% in 2019, according to the latest data from the International Monetary Fund (IMF).翻译:国际货币基金组织 (IMF) 的最新数据显示，到 2022 年，地方政府债务将达到 92 万亿元人民币（12.6 万亿美元），占中国经济产出的 76%，高于 2019 年的 62.2%。

Capital outflows from China have also intensified, reaching $75 billion in September, in the biggest monthly exodus since 2016, Goldman Sachs data showed.翻译:高盛的数据显示，中国的资本外流也在加剧，9月份达到750亿美元，这是自2016年以来最大的月度外流。
